alfredsnippet.snippet:
"I once read a book called 'Forbidden Archeology' wherein all artifacts discovered which did not meet the standard paradigm of evolutionary chronology were wrapped and shuttled off to museum basements. Well, in the basement of Astrophysics lies one solitary item ... electricity."

- unknown source
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Electricity is Astrophysics' Forbidden Archaeology
